The app has been almost unusable for the past week. It constantly crashes with a "Something went wrong" message, and the persistent "outdated data" warning makes it impossible to trust the information shown. Your backend seems to be struggling with data fetching. This isn't a minor bug; it undermines the core function of a trading app. Please treat this with urgency. If the recent updates caused this, please consider reverting them. If this isn't resolved quickly, you will lose a customer.
